item.title: Implementing tests rerun in `ExUnit.run` in Elixir
item.description: TLDR: Read the diff of the PR. It’s just 3 files changes, 65 lines of addition and 2 lines of deletion. Half of the addition is probably test. One of the challenges I faced when I’m writing the Livebook for my Writing a simple Redis Protocol parser in Elixir post is to rerun test that has been written.
